data.title: Mike Sullivan - 2025 - Baseball
data.meta_description:
Mike  Sullivan (15) Pitcher  - 2024 | Game-by-Game Statistics

Made two appearances for the Panthers on the mound during the 2024 season after returning from injury

Historical

Biography

2024 | Game-by-Game Statistics

Made two appearances for the Panthers on the mound during the 2024 season after returning from injury late in the season … finished the year with 1 2/3 innings pitched with one strikeout on the year … made his season debut in the team’s final game of the regular season and retired two batters against Youngstown State (5/18) … tossed a hitless inning in relief during the team’s third Horizon League Championship game and struck out one batter against Youngstown State (5/24).

2023 | Game-by-Game Statistics

Appeared in 19 games for the Panthers during his first season with the team … pitched all 19 1/3 innings for Milwaukee in relief … pitched to a 4.19 ERA as he allowed nine earned runs on the season … struck out 28 batters and walked only eight on the year … was a part of one of Milwaukee’s three shutouts on the season … stuck out three batters in his Milwaukee debut during the team’s opening series at North Alabama (2/19) … did not allow a hit during his next outing as he struck out two batters in an inning at Pacific (2/24) … struck out a pair of batters in an inning of work at Southeast Missouri (3/5) … threw 2/3 scoreless inning with one strikeout at Murray State (3/11) … struck out the side while allowing just one hit in an inning of work at UIC (3/14) … made his Horizon League debut and pitched a hitless inning with two strikeouts at Northern Kentucky (3/19) … had a hitless inning in his home debut against Youngstown State (3/24) … threw another hitless inning against Northern Kentucky (4/22) … tossed a scoreless frame at home against MSOE (4/26) … struck out the only batter her faced at Youngstown State (4/30) … had 1 1/3 innings of work with a trio of strikeouts versus Northern Illinois (5/3) … pitched a season-high 1 2/3 innings without allowing a run and yielding just one hit in home action against Oakland (5/6) … wrapped up his season without allowing an earned run in the Horizon League postseason against Northern Kentucky (5/25).

Prior to Milwaukee: Played baseball College of DuPage.

High School: Played at Wheaton North High School... earned All-Conference and All-Academic honors in 2019.

Personal: Son of Daniel Sullivan and Jenifer Sullivan... chose Milwaukee because of the great academic environment as well as the experienced and dedicated coaching staff... career goal is to graduate with his degree and continue to play baseball as long as he can... also to work to always be helping people in whatever endeavor he pursues... hobbies are spending time with family and friends and enjoying the outdoors... born on April 17, 2001.
